ProjectTitle: Decoding neuropeptide signalling networks underlying experience-dependent brain plasticity
InitialFeedbackHistory:
22/04/2024
Preservation/sharing: note that KU Leuven RDR is intended for data publishing, which also preserves the data, but RDR can't be used for preservation alone. Lirias on the other had is a publication repository, not suitable for data sharing. You can use RDR for data publishing, but also a disciplinary repository, eg wormbase or EBI https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/
label: good with suggestions
